scripts.dev-init: git submodule init && git submodule update && (for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && git checkout develop); done) && npm run dev-install && npm run dev-check
scripts.dev-check: npm run dev-tslint && npm run dev-tsc && npm run dev-test
scripts.dev-build: npm run dev-check && npm run dev-normalize && npm run dev-docs
scripts.dev-install: npm install && npm run dev-install-packages && npm run dev-set-links && npm run dev-use-links
scripts.dev-install-packages: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd $p && npm i); done
scripts.dev-set-links: for p in ./packages/*; do npm link $p; done
scripts.dev-use-links: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && npm run dev-link); done
scripts.dev-normalize: for p in ./packages/*; do cp -a ./normalize/. $p/; done
scripts.dev-tsc: (cd ./packages/ancient-mixins; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-cursor; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-channels; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-peer; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-funicular; npm run tsc)
scripts.dev-tslint: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && npm run tslint); done
scripts.dev-doc: find ./doc/ ! -name '.git' ! -name 'doc' -exec rm -rf {} + && typedoc --readme ./README.md --name "AncientSouls Documentation" --module commonjs --out ./doc/ --excludeExternals --exclude "**/+(node_modules|tests)/**" --disableOutputCheck --ignoreCompilerErrors --includes includes ./packages
scripts.dev-doc-packages: for p in ./packages/*; do rm -rf $p/doc && node_modules/.bin/typedoc --readme $p/README.md --theme markdown --module commonjs --out $p/doc --mode file --exclude "**/+(node_modules|tests)/**" --disableOutputCheck --ignoreCompilerErrors $p; done
scripts.dev-docs: npm run dev-doc && npm run dev-doc-packages
scripts.dev-all-acp: for p in ./packages/* ; do (cd $p && git add . -A && git commit -m "$M" && git push --all origin); done && git add . -A && git commit -m "$M" && git push --all origin
scripts.dev-test: for p in ./packages/* ; do (cd "$p" && echo "$p" && npm run test); done
